disable.desc: Shows if there are any modules disabled in the server.

disable add.desc:
Allows you to disable a module from being used in the server.
The bot will not even respond to commands from a module when it is disabled.
You cannot disable the disable module or the utility module.

disable remove.desc: Removes a module from the list of disabled modules in the guild.

xp.desc: Shows you your xp for the server or globally.

xp ignore.desc: Allows you to disable a user or channel from receiving XP in the guild.

info user.desc:
Displays information about a user.
The user does not need to be in the guild for this command to work.

taptitans artifact.desc: Display information about a tap titans artifact.

taptitans artifact bonus.desc:
Display a list of tap titans artifacts groped by bonus type.
Running this command without an argument will show avaliable bonus types.

taptitans groupadd.desc: Adds a new raid group to the server. You will only ever need more than one of these if you have more than one Tap Titans 2 clan in your discord server *looking at you AC & GT*.

taptitans groupdel.desc: Deletes an existing raid group in the slot. Warning - irreversible. Do this only if you mean it.

taptitans groupget.desc: Displays a tap titans raid group and the most important values that go into setting up a raid, including roles and broadcast channel.

taptitans set.desc:
Allows you to change a tap titans raid group setting.
If group is not supplied, it defaults to the first/only group.

taptitans raid.desc:
Allows you to set up a timer for a tap titans 2 clan raid.
If group is not supplied, it defaults to the first/only group.
Likewise for tier/zone.

taptitans raid cancel.desc: Cancel a currently running raid timer. You can do this any time.

taptitans raid clear.desc: Mark a tap titans raid as completed/cleared. You can do this only after a raid has spawned.

taptitans raid info.desc: Get information about a tap titans raid for a given tier and zone.

taptitans queue.desc:
The queue system for tap titans raids.
Running the command with no arguments will enter you into the queue.
**show** will display the queue
**clear** clears the entire queue and any currently attacking groups
**skip** will skip the currently attacking group e.g. if someone is afk

taptitans unqueue.desc: Allows you to unqueue from the current raid queue.

taptitans done.desc:
Allows you to mark your current raid attack as complete.
If the queue is still ongoing, you can queue back up at the end.
Won't work if you're not attacking.

taptitans tournament.desc:
Displays a forecast of upcoming Tap Titans 2 tournaments.
Icon colour will change depending on tournament status. Blue for open and red for closed.
You can extend the forecast by up to 10 tournaments.
Running the command without **s** on the end will display current tournament only.

taptitans bonuses.desc: Displays a list of possible tournament bonuses for Tap Titans Tournaments.

taptitans card.desc:
Displays information about a tap titans card.
Not specifying a card will show a list.
You can search by acronym, too.

taptitans deck.desc:
Displays information about a curated selection of tap titans decks.
Will display a list of available decks if you don't specify one.

taptitans optimizers.desc: Displays links to popular taptitans optimizers.

taptitans compendium.desc: Displays a link to the tap titans compendium.

taptitans titancount.desc:
Displays titan count at a given stage.
You can optionally supply all of your stats.
Later I'll let you record them.

taptitans edskip.desc:
Shows you the optimal level of ED that you need, given the information available.
Note here that optimal means a full SC splash with 1 snap active.
**mi** = mystic impact
**ab** = arcane bargain
**mech_sw** = mechanized sword multiplier e.g. 0.75
**angelic_gu** - angelic guardian unlocked (true/false)
**anno_pl** = anniversary platinum set multiplier e.g. 1.23

Note: using **tt my set <itemset> yes** you can set these to unlocked, and same for ms/ip/ab with **tt my <stat> <amount>**

taptitans skill.desc:
Shows you information about a skill and its effects.
Entering a level will show you the cost for that level as well as total accumulated SP cost.

taptitans convert.desc: Converts a tap titans letter notation number to the master race: scientific notation.

taptitans gold.desc:
Displays information about a tap titans gold source and what artifacts you need to make it work.
Not supplying an argument will show available gold types.

taptitans build.desc:
Allows you to automagically generate a skill tree for the given build + gold type.
This will pull off your ms stat if you have set it with **tt my ms <stage>**.

Disclaimer: this command is still very early alpha and so builds are not that great. They're not terrible either, though.

taptitans my.desc: A suite of commands to help you manage your TT2 stats that you have stored with the bot.

taptitans my profile.desc: Shows your tap titans stats that you recorded with the bot.

seen.desc: Displays information about when the bot last saw a person.
